message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a great opportunity to get it at a discounted price. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thanks for the offer, Alice! I'm interested, but the price is a little high for me. Would you consider $90?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob! I can see you're a serious buyer. I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $100.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  How about $95?  That's a fair compromise.
I can see you're really interested in this product, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $105, but that's as low as I can go.
Alice, I appreciate you working with me.  To be honest, $95 is as high as I can go.  If you're firm on $105, I'll have to consider my other options.
I can see you're really trying to make a decision, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $98, which is a compromise between our last two offers. Let's make a deal!
